name: Out of the Pan & Into the Fire
name_original: Out of the Pan & Into the Fire
description: Some say that the pan is best utilized as a melee weapon. Those people are wrong. In this game, draw a path for your pan before throwing it at your foody foes. But make sure you can catch your pan after you throw it, or else things can get… out of control. Upgrade your pan-handling skills with 8 custom items, giving you new ways to crush kitchen combatants in style. With half a dozen unique enemies, this game is the ultimate test of both martial and culinary arts.
